original_text: Whoever blasphemes the name of the Lord shall surely be put to death. All the congregation shall stone him. The sojourner as well as the native, when he blasphemes the Name, shall be put to death.
korean_text: 여호와의 이름을 모독하면 그를 반드시 죽일지니 온 회중이 돌로 그를 칠 것이니라 거류민이든지 본토인이든지 여호와의 이름을 모독하면 그를 죽일지니라

sentences.original_text: Whoever blasphemes the name of the Lord
shall surely be put to death.
All the congregation shall stone him.
The sojourner as well as the native
